bimmal ehema nathnam kawuruth danna widiyata hathu apita nupurudu deyak nam neweyine.kotinma kiyanawa nam kanna ganna pus wisheshayak.dilira thama wargaya bo kirimata yoda ganna wisheshitha wu upakramaye prathipala thamayi api aaharayata ganne hathu kiyala.poshana gunaya wagema aushadiya gunayenuth bimmal paripurna aharayak widiyatayi salakenne.wisheshayenma rakthahinathawayata ha liyukemiya rogaya palanaya kirimeth suwisheshi gunayak me hathuwala thiyenawa kiyala sadahan wenawa.ee nisama thamayi api kawuruth danna swabhawika hathu warga[mawali hathu,urupaha]walata amatharawa swayan rakiyawak widiyatath bimmal wagawa janapriya wela thiyenne.wagawak kiwwata meka gewaththe karana wagawak ehema nam noweyi.mokada samahara aya eeka patalawa gannawa.bimmal wagawak karamuda kiyala mama ahapu gowi mahathwaru kipa denekma mata dipu uththare thamayi mahaththaya waththe ida nam na .wathura gahannath tikak amaruyi.kiyala.eth ithin eka athakata ehema kiyapu eka pudumayakuth neweyi.hodata mathaka thiyaganna me wagawa api karanne parisara thathwa palanaya karapu bimmal gruhayak thula.ehema nathnam niwasema kamarayak apita me sadaha yoda ganna puluwan.parisara thathwa palanaya karapu gruhayak kiyala mama kiwwe me hathu waga karanna parisaraye thethamanaya ee kiwwe aardrathawaya tikak wadi wenna oona.eekata api upakrama kipayak pawichchi karanawa.bimata yodaganne theth karapu wali thattuwak.

prawina nalu sanath gunathilaka rogi wi mahanuwara maha rohale newasikawa prathikara labamin sitina bawa apa wetha wartha wenawa.me pilibandawa soya balapu apita dana gannata labune mita wasara gananawakata pera, wijaya kumarathungayan samaga "raja wadakarayo" chithrapataye rangapa awasthawe satan jawanikawakadi konde athi wu asthi aabadhayak yali mathuwima nisa sanath mese rogi wi thibena bawayi.waidya lesli dharmawardhana mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe haththahathara wani wattuwe prathikara labana sanath gunathilaka mahathata newasikawa sita nokadawa bhautha chikithsaka wyayama sidu karana lesata waidya upades labi thibenawa.
